Text: yeah, I approve support the artist, if you like your music!

Totally.  And if you're new to John Frusciante solo and like the Chili Peppers, check out Shadows Collide With People.  It's more rock-n-roll than electronic and features Chad Smith.  That one's by Warner Music Group who are anal about piracy so steal that one and definitely the Record Collection label that this is released under is a small label that deserves our support so buy this one.  Just my two cents.
